tool_description:
This is the code for the tutorial on my blog.

https://amirkamizi.com/blog/php-simple-rest-api
name: PHP Simple REST
title: PHP Simple REST

api_list.name: get-users
api_list.description: use this endpoint to get all the users
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com/api/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: get-one-user
api_list.description: use this endpoint to get one of the users
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com/api/users/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "php-simple-rest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
